caption.p: Relative abundances of fungal taxa in the coarse woody debris of Abies alba and Fagus sylvatica in the Salajka natural forest at the order level ( A) and at the genus level ( B). Abbreviations: A: Ascomycota; B: Basidiomycota. Only genera and orders with at least 3% relative abundance in one of the treatments were specified, and all others were classified to the phylum level.
